text:
🌡️ **Heating Network Repairs**

In some dormitories on Braichevskogo and Yangel streets, there is no hot water supply.

Estimated return time, according to Kyivteploenergo: tomorrow at 15:00.

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: Some dormitories on Braichevskogo and Yangel streets are currently without hot water. Kyivteploenergo estimates that service will resume tomorrow at 15:00.
title: Hot Water Outage in Dorms

text:
🟢 **Administration**

**Points of Resilience**
**Points of resilience will be in working rooms 9, 13, and 14 of the dormitories. They promise to organize a PR in each dormitory that has a shelter and a working generator.**

**Heating**
**It will gradually appear in the student campus by the end of the week.**

**Windows**
**The student campus purchased windows through a tender that were supposed to insulate the dormitories, but during installation, it turned out that the specifications indicated windows of the wrong size.**

Therefore, the replacement of windows in the dormitories is postponed indefinitely.

**Flood**
**On Friday, the basement of dormitory 10 was flooded due to a pipe malfunction.**

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: Points of resilience will be established in working rooms 9, 13, and 14 of the dormitories, with plans for public relations in each dormitory that has a shelter and a functioning generator. Heating is expected to gradually return to the student campus by the end of the week. The installation of windows intended to insulate the dormitories has been delayed indefinitely due to incorrect specifications. Additionally, the basement of dormitory 10 was flooded on Friday due to a pipe malfunction.
title: Dormitory Updates: Resilience Points

rephrased_news: A quest and costume contest will take place tomorrow in the dormitory, with various prizes for participants.
title: Costume Contest Tomorrow!

text:
🌡️ **Repair Work on Heating Networks**

Today from 9:00, there is no hot water supply and heating in most dormitories.

Estimated return time: 12:00 on November 12.

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: Most dormitories are without hot water and heating today from 9:00. The estimated return time is 12:00 on November 12.
title: Heating Outage in Dormitories

text:
Hello everyone!

Very soon, we want to hold a musical evening in our dormitory ♥️🎶

We know that many talented people live here, so anyone who can play any musical instruments or sing and wants to perform and help us is welcome🫂
(Write "+" to @Andrewkrulko)

**P.S. For help, we will close 4 months of work off🥰**

With love, student council🤍!
rephrased_news: A musical evening is planned soon in the dormitory, inviting residents who can perform to participate.
title: Musical Evening Planned Soon

rephrased_news: KPI Telecom will turn off the internet from 23:00 to 6:00 for scheduled technical work.
title: Internet Downtime Scheduled

text:
🚰 **Message from the Future**

According to Kyivteploenergo, starting tomorrow at 9:00, there will be no water supply.

The estimated return time will be communicated by Kyivteploenergo tomorrow, based on the volume of work.

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: Starting tomorrow at 9:00, there will be a water supply interruption, with the estimated return time to be announced by Kyivteploenergo.
title: Water Supply Disruption Tomorrow

text:
⚠️ **Emergency**

Emergency power outage across the Shulyavka district and KPI.

Estimated return time according to DTEK is 18:00.

If you need to recharge, approach the guards for a power bank.

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: An emergency power outage is affecting the Shulyavka district and KPI, with an estimated restoration time of 18:00. Residents can request power banks from the guards if needed.
title: Emergency Power Outage Alert

text:
Hello everyone☀️

We invite you **tomorrow at 21:45 to the first working room** for a football match viewing⚽️

We will be waiting for you😉

With love, student council♥️!
rephrased_news: Residents are invited to a football match viewing tomorrow at 21:45 in the first working room.
title: Football Match Viewing Invitation

text:
☃️ **Heating Season Ended**

Today marks the end of the heating season according to the [KMDA plan.](https://t.me/KyivCityOfficial/9249)

In the coming days, heating will be completely turned off in all dormitories.

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: The heating season has officially ended, and heating will be completely turned off in all dormitories in the coming days.
title: End of Heating Season

text:
**💧Emergency on Heating Networks**

In the dormitories on Oleksy Tykhyi and Borshchahivska streets, there is no hot water supply due to a heating network break.

Estimated return time, according to Kyivteploenergo: April 3 by 11:00.

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: Dormitories on Oleksy Tykhyi and Borshchahivska streets are without hot water due to a heating network break, with an estimated return time of April 3 by 11:00.
title: Hot Water Outage Report

text:
💧**May Without Water**

In the dormitories, there is no hot water supply due to a heating network break and ongoing repair work until May 13 at 23:59. After their completion, hydraulic tests of the pipes will begin until the end of the month.

The estimated completion date for all work and return of water, according to Kyivteploenergo: May 28 - 31.

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: Dormitories are currently without hot water due to a heating network break, with repairs expected to continue until May 13. Hydraulic tests will follow, with an estimated completion date for all work between May 28 and 31.
title: Extended Water Supply Issues

text:
💡**Power Outages**

Starting May 16, hourly power outages are possible in Kyiv and the student campus according to the [schedule](https://www.dtek-kem.com.ua/ua/shutdowns) of Ukrenergo and DTEK.

Preliminary outages are possible [from](https://t.me/suspilnenews/32727) 00:00 to 9:00 or from 16:00 to 24:00.

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: Hourly power outages are anticipated in Kyiv and the student campus starting May 16, according to the schedules from Ukrenergo and DTEK.
title: Hourly Power Outages Expected

text:
⚡️**Power Outage Schedules for the Dormitory**

On May 17, outages will only occur from 00:00 to 8:00 and from 19:00 to 00:00.

Black lightning - no power.
Gray lightning - 50/50.
No lightning - power is on (in the absence of emergency outages).

The elevator is not working due to the outage, so you won't get stuck there.

Hot water is promised to return in June.
rephrased_news: On May 17, power outages will occur from 00:00 to 8:00 and from 19:00 to 00:00. Hot water is expected to return in June.
title: Dormitory Power Outage Schedule

text:
UPD: The hot water supply outage has been extended to May 10.

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: The hot water supply outage has been extended to May 10.
title: Hot Water Outage Extended

text:
🟢 **Administration**

**Accommodation**
The accommodation algorithm for the summer will be tomorrow, based on a similar, [last year's principle](https://t.me/kpicampus/1580).

The number of accommodation places for the next academic year is planned to increase by 1.5 thousand. Instructions for accommodation will appear by July 17.

**Elevators**
Elevators will begin to resume operation, but you need to monitor the outage schedules to avoid getting stuck in the elevator in the middle of the night.

**Inventory**
From June 5 to 7, an inventory commission will check the current state of inventory in the rooms.

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: Accommodation for the summer will begin on August 26, with lists from faculties and institutes expected by the end of the week. Approximately 1,500 additional accommodation places are planned for the next academic year. Elevators will resume operation, and an inventory check will take place from June 5 to 7.
title: Summer Accommodation Plans

text:
🔥Hello dear residents of #20🔥

This **Saturday, June 22, 2024, in the yard of our dormitory**, we invite you to celebrate the Kupala holiday, as well as the day of #20!

🌺You will find:

- Charity fair
- Raffle of 2 exclusive t-shirts
- Kupala entertainment
- Homemade kvass and other treats
- Good mood

With love, student council!♥️

With the support of the student trade union 💙

We are collecting for👇
**The unit of students from FSP, ORVP "Blind Fury" UDA** needs your help. The guys are fighting without state support and need financial assistance for servicing cannons, drones, and equipment.
https://www.instagram.com/blind.fury.official?igsh=MWJmd2ozdno4MnY1Zw==
rephrased_news: Residents of dormitory #20 are invited to celebrate the Kupala holiday and the dormitory's day on June 22, 2024, with various activities and a charity fair.
title: Kupala Holiday Celebration

text:
🌡️ **Well, you got it**

**Kyivteploenergo promises every day to finish the work by 23:00, but "something" is going off plan.**

Estimated time: by the end of the month. Probably in 2024.

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: Kyivteploenergo has indicated that work is ongoing, with an expected completion by the end of the month.
title: Heating Work Delays Reported

text:
Dear friends!

I inform you that by the order of the Minister of Education and Science, as of today, July 19, 2024, **I have been appointed as the rector of KPI Igor Sikorsky.**

**Thank you for your trust!**
I understand the responsibility I am taking on and will begin to implement the points of the program with which I ran for election.

**The urgent tasks** now are the successful conduct of the admission campaign, ensuring the stability of the university's operation, and, most importantly, concentrating efforts to strengthen the defense capability of the state.

I will inform you about further steps on the [channel](https://t.me/melnychenko2024) and the official resources of the university.
rephrased_news: As of July 19, 2024, I have been appointed as the rector of KPI Igor Sikorsky, with a focus on the admission campaign and strengthening the university's operational stability.
title: New KPI Rector Appointed

text:
🟢 **Administration 06.08**

**Accommodation**
Will begin on August 26, by the end of the week there will be lists for accommodation from faculties and institutes. A total of about 9 thousand students are planned to be brought out for mixed learning.

**Masters**
By August 2, they should have written a [request](https://docs.google.com/document/d/13FJxmoUKzXYeRo9T8oGxshdi3MXm1faIDpQwAO6Tk1E/edit?usp=sharing) for a change of payment format and extension of residence in the dormitory until August 31.

If you haven't written a request, please contact the head of the dormitory.

**Hot Water**
In some dormitories, there has been no hot water for 3 months due to major repair work.

**Elevators**
Due to the stabilization of electricity supply, the operation of most elevators will be restored.

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: Accommodation will begin on August 26, with lists for accommodation expected by the end of the week. Hot water has been unavailable in some dormitories for three months due to major repairs, but most elevators will resume operation due to improved electricity supply.
title: Accommodation and Hot Water Update

text:

⚡️⚡️⚡️Reason: emergency work by KYIYENERGO. ✅Restoration is expected on 29.08.24 approximately from 13:00.

title: Hot Water Supply Emergency
